library-construction-16s-rrna-based_libr: DNA was end- sequenced using capillary sequencing.
project-description_metagenome_name: Guerrero Negro Hypersaline Microbial Mat 5-6 mm depth Metagenome
sample-isolation-and-treatment_sample_is: The 25 x 25 cm x 6 cm mat piece was brought to shore in a pan of its own water. Four replicate 6 cm thick x 8 mm diameter cores were excised from the middle of the mat sample using a sterile coring instrument. Each core was sectioned into coins as described in Table S2 using sterile scalpel blades for each layer. The mat is vertically striated and these striations were used to ensure that coins 40	were obtained from the same layer of each replicate core. Coins were frozen on liquid nitrogen.
sample-origin_location: Exportadora de Sal saltworks, Guerrero Negro, Baja California Sur, Mexico
sequences_sequences_predicted_genes: Metagenome data cosist of predicted genes
